translated: the color that displays an ocean of qualities that are not to be taken away and are inexhaustible, the color that does not dwell in or mix with any world, the color that pervades all directions without obstruction, the color that displays in a single instant of mind an ocean of realms with various colors in an inexpressible number of ways,

original: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i kha dog dang / sems can rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i kha dog dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad na sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i sprin gyi sgra sgrog pa'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i kha dog dang / sems can rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i kha dog dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad na sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i sprin gyi sgra sgrog pa'i kha dog dang /
translated: the color that increases the great force of joy in all beings, the color that gathers an ocean of all beings, the color that emits from all the pores of the body the sound of the clouds of the ocean of all the qualities of the buddhas,

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong ba'i kha dog dang / chos thams cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za ba yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs su snang ba'i kha dog dang /üîΩnam mkha' ltar @83b dri ma med par snang ba'i kha dog dang / rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par dag pa ltar rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i 'od la gnas pa'i kha dog dang / chos nyid dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi kha dog dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong ba'i kha dog dang / chos thams cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za ba yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs su snang ba'i kha dog dang / nam mkha' ltar @83b dri ma med par snang ba'i kha dog dang / rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par dag pa ltar rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i 'od la gnas pa'i kha dog dang / chos nyid dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi kha dog dang /
translated: the color that purifies the ocean of the aspirations and interests of all sentient beings, the color that teaches the meaning of all phenomena without doubt, the color that is the appearance of the various colors of the sphere of the net of light rays,üîΩthe color that appears like the stainless sky, the color that is the light of the stainless dust that is like the pure king of jewels, the color of the light of the stainless nature of phenomena,

original: kha dog dpag tu med pa'i tshul rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / phyogs kun tu snang bar byed pa'i kha dog dang / dus la gang du bab par 'gro ba yongs su ston pa ma 'dres pa'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: kha dog dpag tu med pa'i tshul rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / phyogs kun tu snang bar byed pa'i kha dog dang / dus la gang du bab par 'gro ba yongs su ston pa ma 'dres pa'i kha dog dang /
translated: the color that teaches the ocean of the different ways of the infinite colors, the color that illuminates everywhere, the color that teaches the unmixed way of going to beings at the appropriate time,

original: zhi ba dang dul ba'i phyogs las byung ba'i kha dog dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i kha dog dang / 'gro ba bsod nams kyi zhing thams cad la rab tu ston pa'i kha dog dang / 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu sel ba'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: zhi ba dang dul ba'i phyogs las byung ba'i kha dog dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i kha dog dang / 'gro ba bsod nams kyi zhing thams cad la rab tu ston pa'i kha dog dang / 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu sel ba'i kha dog dang /
translated: the color that arises from the side of peace and tranquility, the color that completely pacifies all afflictions, the color that shows all beings to be fields of merit, the color that completely removes all fears,

original: don yod par 'gro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog dang / ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa chen po rab tu brjod pa'i kha dog dang / chags pa med pa'i lus kyis kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog dang / lus dam pa'i sprin gyi dbyangs kyis 'gro ba kun tu ston par byed pa'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: don yod par 'gro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog dang / ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa chen po rab tu brjod pa'i kha dog dang / chags pa med pa'i lus kyis kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog dang / lus dam pa'i sprin gyi dbyangs kyis 'gro ba kun tu ston par byed pa'i kha dog dang /
translated: the color that fills the world with the endless, the color that proclaims the great wisdom of the conqueror, the color that pervades everywhere with an unattached body, the color that shows the world with the voice of the cloud of the supreme body,

original: byams pa'i rgya mtsho chen po yongs su sdud pa'i kha dog dang / bsod nams kyi ri rab chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i kha dog dang / 'gro ba thams cad du mi gnas kyang 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i kha dog dang /üîΩye shes @84a *//
analyzed: byams pa'i rgya mtsho chen po yongs su sdud pa'i kha dog dang / bsod nams kyi ri rab chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i kha dog dang / 'gro ba thams cad du mi gnas kyang 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i kha dog dang / ye shes @84a *//
translated: the color of the great ocean of love being gathered, the color of the great Mount Meru of merit being accomplished, the color of the reflection appearing in all the continuums of the world without abiding in all migrations,

original: kyi stobs chen po rnam par sbyong ba'i kha dog dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa dang 'grogs pa'i kha dog dang / rin po che thams cad lta bu'i kha dog dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po ltar yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: kyi stobs chen po rnam par sbyong ba'i kha dog dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa dang 'grogs pa'i kha dog dang / rin po che thams cad lta bu'i kha dog dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po ltar yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
translated: the color of the great power of wisdom being purified, the color of being accompanied by the recollection of all worlds, the color of all jewels, the color of the display of the essence of Vairocana,

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i tshul dang mthun pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la mngon du gyur pa'i kha dog dang / mig 'dzum gyis rgyas pas 'gro ba mos par byed pa'i kha dog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dam pa'i 'od kyi kha dog dang /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i tshul dang mthun pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la mngon du gyur pa'i kha dog dang / mig 'dzum gyis rgyas pas 'gro ba mos par byed pa'i kha dog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dam pa'i 'od kyi kha dog dang /
translated: the color that accords with the inclinations of all beings, the color that manifests the aspects of omniscience, the color that delights beings with a smile, the color of the light of the ornaments of the best of jewels,

original: 'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa la phyir phyogs pa med pa'i kha dog dang / nges pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa'i kha dog dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa la phyir phyogs pa med pa'i kha dog dang / nges pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa'i kha dog dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
translated: the color that is not averse to being unimpeded in all worlds, the color that is without certainty and without attachment, the color that manifests the power of the supreme lord of miracles through blessings,

original: rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba snang bar byed pa'i kha dog dang / chos kyi dbyings kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba snang bar byed pa'i kha dog dang / chos kyi dbyings kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa'i kha dog dang /
translated: the color that displays the power of the supreme leader of all miracles, the color that illuminates the roots of virtue of the tathagatas, the color that is engaged in the ocean of the way of the absence of wrongdoing in the realm of phenomena,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i kha dog dang / kha dog sna tshogs rab tu sgrub @84b pa'i kha dog dang / legs par spyad pa dang / rgyu mthun pa bzang pos byung ba'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i kha dog dang / kha dog sna tshogs rab tu sgrub @84b pa'i kha dog dang / legs par spyad pa dang / rgyu mthun pa bzang pos byung ba'i kha dog dang /
translated: the color that is the appearance of a reflection that has gone to the circle of the retinue of all buddhas, the color that accomplishes various colors, the color that arises from the concordant cause of good conduct,

original: 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar sgrub pa'i kha dog dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na mi ngoms pa'i kha dog dang / 'od dang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od du snang ba'i kha dog dang / dus gsum gyi kha dog rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar sgrub pa'i kha dog dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na mi ngoms pa'i kha dog dang / 'od dang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od du snang ba'i kha dog dang / dus gsum gyi kha dog rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
translated: the color of accomplishing the vinaya just as it is, the color of being never satisfied with looking at all worlds, the color of the appearance of various kinds of light, the color of revealing the ocean of the colors of the three times,

original: 'od zer kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa rgya mtsho rab tu 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog brjod du med pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba kun las 'das pa'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: 'od zer kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa rgya mtsho rab tu 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog brjod du med pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba kun las 'das pa'i kha dog dang /
translated: the color of radiating the ocean of all the colors of light rays, the color of revealing the ocean of innumerable various kinds of light circles, the color of being beyond the light of all incenses,

original: ba spu'i sgo re re nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs dri ma med cing yangs pa'i sprin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi kha dog dang /üîΩme tog yid du 'ong ba'i ri rab kyi sprin mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang / phreng ba sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa'i shing gi sprin phreng ba /
analyzed: ba spu'i sgo re re nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs dri ma med cing yangs pa'i sprin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi kha dog dang / me tog yid du 'ong ba'i ri rab kyi sprin mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang / phreng ba sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa'i shing gi sprin phreng ba /
translated: the color of the clouds of sun mandalas as numerous as the atoms in countless buddha realms that appear from each of their pores, the color of the blessing of the clouds of the stainless and vast forms of moon mandalas,üîΩthe color of the emission of infinite clouds of fragrant flower Sumerus, the color of the clouds of trees that create various garlands

original: thams cad kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i kha dog dang / rin po che thams cad kyi padmo'i sprin yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / spos dang bdug spos thams cad kyi na bun @85a *//
analyzed: thams cad kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i kha dog dang / rin po che thams cad kyi padmo'i sprin yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang / spos dang bdug spos thams cad kyi na bun @85a *//
translated: raining down everywhere, the color of the display of clouds of lotuses made of all jewels, the color of the clouds of all incense and fragrant smoke,

original: gyi gzugs kyi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'grengs pa'i kha dog tu sems kyi skad cig re re la phye ma'i mdzod kyi sprin thams cad byin gyis brlabs shing phyogs bcur chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par bkang nas mthong
analyzed: gyi gzugs kyi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'grengs pa'i kha dog tu sems kyi skad cig re re la phye ma'i mdzod kyi sprin thams cad byin gyis brlabs shing phyogs bcur chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par bkang nas mthong
translated: and the clouds of forms of all the tathagatas filling the entire realm of phenomena with the colors of the clouds of the treasure of dust particles in every single instant of mind.

original: bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang / rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo sprul pa mngon par sgrub pas 'dul ba dang / yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang / rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo sprul pa mngon par sgrub pas 'dul ba dang / yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They were blessed to fill the ocean of the realm of phenomena in the ten directions with the clouds of the forms of all the tathagatas, and they were seen to tame beings to be tamed by seeing, to tame beings to be tamed by hearing, to tame beings to be tamed by recollection, to tame beings to be tamed by the emanation and accomplishment of the wheel of the Dharma, and to tame beings to be tamed by the time of ripening.

original: gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bas 'dul ba dang / khong du chud par bya bas 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos 'phrul sna tshogs yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bas 'dul ba dang / khong du chud par bya bas 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos 'phrul sna tshogs yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
translated: They are those who are disciplined by the display of the physical body, those who are disciplined by service, those who are disciplined by understanding, those who are disciplined by the display of various miracles and spiritual powers, and those who are disciplined by the display of inconceivable miracles and spiritual powers.

original: chos 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang dang / dus kyi dbang dang / mi dge ba'i las las rnam par bzlog pa'i dbang dang / dge ba'i las yongs su sgrub pa la so sor dgod pa'i dbang dang /
analyzed: chos 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang dang / dus kyi dbang dang / mi dge ba'i las las rnam par bzlog pa'i dbang dang / dge ba'i las yongs su sgrub pa la so sor dgod pa'i dbang dang /
translated: They are the ones who are disciplined by the display of the various miracles and spiritual powers of the bodhisattvas.

original: sngon smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dbang dang / thams @85b cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs kyi dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu thob pa'i chos kyi dbang dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa shin tu sgrub pa'i snying rje chen po'i stobs yongs su 'byung ba'i dbang dang /
analyzed: sngon smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dbang dang / thams @85b cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs kyi dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu thob pa'i chos kyi dbang dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa shin tu sgrub pa'i snying rje chen po'i stobs yongs su 'byung ba'i dbang dang /
translated: the power of having accomplished great aspirations in the past, the power of the force of omniscience, the power of the Dharma of having attained the emanations of the vast liberation of the bodhisattvas, the power of the arising of the strength of great compassion that is accomplished through protecting all beings,

original: byams pa chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa yongs su skyed pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par blang ba'i phyir rab tu 'jug go /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa yongs su skyed pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par blang ba'i phyir rab tu 'jug go /
translated: and the power of the motivation that produces the ocean of pure great love.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‚ÄúNoble one,

original: de ltar kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba la rab tu gnas te /
analyzed: de ltar kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba la rab tu gnas te /
translated: In this way, she was established in the bodhisattva liberation called ‚Äúthe roots of goodness that are the encouragement of beings according to their thoughts in order to ripen all beings.‚Äù

analyzed: rnam par dbye ba med pa'i chos la zhugs nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lus kyi kha dog dang dbyibs yongs su bstan te /
translated: She entered into the teaching of the absence of differentiation and revealed bodies of color and form without center or edge.

original: spyod pa'i lus re re las mtha' dang dbus med pa'i kha dog rgya mtsho 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas te spyod pa'i kha dog re re las mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'od zer gyi spring yongs su bkye zhing /

translated: In each body of conduct, she made an ocean of colors without center or edge appear in the world. In each color of conduct, she sent out an ocean of light rays without center or edge.

original: 'od zer re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gzugs brnyan mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba mtha' dang @86a *//

translated: In each light ray, she revealed an ocean of reflections of buddha realms without center or edge. In each buddha realm, she revealed an ocean of the appearances of the arising of tathƒÅgatas without center or edge.

original: dbus med pa yongs su bstan te /
analyzed: dbus med pa yongs su bstan te /
translated: I have revealed the centerless.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa byed cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa byed cing /

analyzed: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skul ba byed do //

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyang yongs su skyed do //üîΩbskyed pa rnams kyang yangs par byed do //üîΩdge ba'i rtsa ba yangs par byas pa rnams ni /

analyzed: rnam par 'phel bar byed de / kho mo ni /

translated: In each instant of mind, I establish the infinite and boundless realms of beings in the stage of irreversibility on the path to unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

analyzed: shin tu rgyas par chen po'i mdo; sangs rgyas pa po che zhes bya ba las /

analyzed: ` bam po brgya lnga pa /
translated: Chapter 105

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‚ÄúSon of noble family,

original: gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di skad du smras te /üîΩkhyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ni /
